verbs.description: [ARG0: assembly] [V: plans] [ARG1: hearings to examine marijuana legalization] the assembly plans to hold four public hearings this fall on authorizing adult marijuana use as the state continues along a track to legalization assembly members joseph lentol richard gottfried crystal peoples - stokes and linda b rosenthal will seek input from the public on proposals to create a regulated marijuana market and also learn from other states that have legalized the drug marijuana
